ch.cern.dod.ui.controller

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zkoss.zk.ui.AbstractComponent
      • org.zkoss.zk.ui.HtmlBasedComponent
        • org.zkoss.zul.impl.XulElement
          • org.zkoss.zul.Box
            • org.zkoss.zul.Vbox
              • ch.cern.dod.ui.controller.AdminController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, org.zkoss.zk.ui.Component, org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.AfterCompose, org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.BeforeCompose, org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.Scope, org.zkoss.zk.ui.sys.ComponentCtrl

    public class AdminController
extends org.zkoss.zul.Vbox
implements org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.BeforeCompose, org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.AfterCompose
    Controller for the admin overview of instances. It allows the admins to manage every instance.
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • beforeCompose

        public void beforeCompose()
        Method executed before the page is composed. Obtains instances from DB.
        Specified by:
        beforeCompose in interface org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.BeforeCompose

      • afterCompose

        public void afterCompose()
        Method executed after composing the page. Sets the model of the grid with the instances obtained before composing.
        Specified by:
        afterCompose in interface org.zkoss.zk.ui.ext.AfterCompose

      • displayOrHideAreas

        private void displayOrHideAreas()
        Displays or hides certain areas when refreshing instances and upgrades

      • refreshInstances

        public void refreshInstances()
        Refreshes the list of instances.

      • checkAll

        public void checkAll()
        Checks all the instances for a group operation

      • startupAll

        public void startupAll()
        Startup all selected instances. It checks that instances are not awaiting approval or running (busy and unknown included). It does not matter if the instance is pending a job, it will be executed after it.

      • shutdownAll

        public void shutdownAll()
        Shutdown all selected instances. It checks that instances are not awaiting approval or stopped. It does not matter if the instance is pending a job, it will be executed after it.

      • backupAll

        public void backupAll()
        Backup all selected instances. It checks that instances are not awaiting approval. It does not matter if the instance is pending a job, it will be executed after it.

      • maintainAll

        public void maintainAll()
        Set all selected instances in maintenance state.

      • upgradeAll

        public void upgradeAll()
        Upgrade all selected instances. It checks that instances are not awaiting approval and have a pending upgrade. It does not matter if the instance is pending a job, it will be executed after it.

      • openAddUpgrade

        public void openAddUpgrade()
        Opens the add upgrade window.

      • showAll

        public void showAll(boolean show)
        Displays all instances in the view (or goes back to normal mold)
        Parameters:
        show - indicates if all should be displayed or not

      • showAllToDestroy

        public void showAllToDestroy(boolean show)
        Displays all instances to destroy
        Parameters:
        show - indicates if all should be displayed or not

      • showAllUpgrades

        public void showAllUpgrades(boolean show)
        Displays all upgrades in the view
        Parameters:
        show - indicates if all should be displayed or not

      • showAllCommandStats

        public void showAllCommandStats(boolean show)
        Displays all command stats in the view
        Parameters:
        show - indicates if all should be displayed or not

      • showAllJobStats

        public void showAllJobStats(boolean show)
        Displays all job stats in the view
        Parameters:
        show - indicates if all should be displayed or not

        public void filterInstances()
        Re-renders the tree in order to filter instances.

        Re-renders the grid in order to filter job stats.

        Displays an error window for the error code provided.
